narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Aba INC is a Home Health provider based in Washington, DC. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $80.8M in Medicaid payments across 550K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $80.8M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
